channel.title: 0 on Carl Müller-Crepon
channel.description: Recent content in 0 on Carl Müller-Crepon

item.title: How Ethnic Cleavages Divide Voters into Parties: New Methods and Evidence from Sub-Sahara Africa
item.description: We explore the effect of ethnicity on the partitioning of voters into political parties.

item.title: Control through Conservation: The Ethnic Politics of Natural Protection in Sub-Saharan Africa
item.description: We study the effect of ethnic politics on the allocation of protected areas.

item.title: Cracking or Packing Ethnic Groups? The Colonial Design of Administrative Units in Sub-Saharan Africa
item.description: I study the roots of colonial administrative unit designs in ethnic geography.
